name: The Bonekest Dungeon
description:
THE BONEKEST DUNGEON

Boneky is a mighty undead mage, who is seeking more power in the deepest dungeon of the world. Trying to acquire it he has to make his way through the enchanted maze. But he must be vigilant because the ancient evil can bonk him from the shadows.

Ludum Dare page

INSTRUCTIONS

In order to win the game, you need to lurk around a maze while trying to find three keys hidden in it. Once you get all of the keys you will be able to escape the maze. The maze rooms are connected with portals — don’t let them trick you and make sure to keep track of your movements!

You can use magic in order to find which room the ancient evil is hiding in right now. Every time you go through a portal the evil travels as well. Don’t let it get you!

CONTROLS

W/A/S/D — movement

Q — cast magic to reveal the room where the monster’s hiding (be careful - you only have a few tries)

TITLED GOOSE TEAM

Tricky Fat Cat — code, game design;

Alexander Getmansky — code, game design;

Ruslan Seferbekov — game design, level design, UI design;

Nadezhda Osipova — game design, UI design;

SPECIAL THANKS

Joshua McLean — for creating the soundtrack;
